Commentary: Zulfiqar Babar to Roy, no run, nice start, flat outside off, played towards point
Zulfiqar Babar to Roy, FOUR, out goes the reverse sweep. Roy gets low and gets the ball to clear short third man. Clears the fielder comfortably
Zulfiqar Babar to Roy, SIX, that's the first six. Roy runs down to the pitch, gets there and just lofts the ball over mid-on. Easy as ...
Zulfiqar Babar to Roy, no run, flat on middle, blocked this time
Zulfiqar Babar to Roy, no run, strays down leg this time, played away towards short fine leg
Zulfiqar Babar to Roy, no run, stops in the surface. Flat delivery on middle and leg, Roy pops the ball back
Mills to McCullum, 1 run, good length outside off, tapped towards third man with an angled bat
Mills to Roy, FOUR, guided away, just past slip. Good length outside off from over the wicket, the ball moving away. Roy carves the ball past slip for four
Mills to Roy, FOUR, another boundary. Good length on middle, Roy pulls, doesn't keep it down. Sits up for Roy to hammer through midwicket

Mills to Roy, no run, whoa. Terrible communication from Roy. Good length on middle and leg, worked to square leg. Roy calls for one, realises there is no run, and sends McCullum back. Anwar Ali misses at the bowler's end. Hung him out to dry there did Roy.
Mills to Roy, no run, on a length outside off, defended
Mills to Roy, FOUR, very slow, short. Roy slaps the ball in front of cover for four. Just too easy. Poor bowling that
Zulfiqar Babar to McCullum, 1 run, just a tad short and McCullum is all over it. Pulls to deep square leg, picks out the sole man there
Zulfiqar Babar to Roy, FOUR, another boundary. Flat on off, Roy gets down and clears the fielder at short third man. Sweep ball-striking. One of his easier shots
Zulfiqar Babar to Roy, 1 run, flat on off, drilled to long-off
Zulfiqar Babar to McCullum, FOUR, four more. McCullum runs down and swipes the ball over midwicket, on the bounce and over.
Zulfiqar Babar to McCullum, 1 run, slightly short on middle and leg, pulled to deep square leg for a run
Zulfiqar Babar to Roy, OUT, bowled this time. Flat delivery on leg stump, Roy gets low, looks to paddle, but misses. The ball clips leg stump and the Gladiators have their first
Mills to McCullum, FOUR, hammered away for four more. On a length on middle, McCullum waits for the ball to come to him and then crashes a pull over midwicket
Mills to McCullum, no run, that's the slower ball. McCullum runs down but is flummoxed by the change in pace. Rolls through to the keeper
Mills to McCullum, 1 run, on a length on off, carved away towards third man
Mills to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, worked down to fine leg
Mills to McCullum, 1 run, a slower ball on off, McCullum let that come to him before carving one down to third man
Mills to Fakhar Zaman, no run, well bowled. Puts extra oomph in this, gets the ball to slide through to the keeper. Beaten for pace
Zulfiqar Babar to McCullum, SIX, six! Full from Babar on leg, McCullum clears his front leg and shovels this way over long-on. Makes it look easy
Zulfiqar Babar to McCullum, 1 run, slow down leg, pushed into the leg side for one
Zulfiqar Babar to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, comes down, looks for a big hit but the length is dragged back, pushed away towards cover
Zulfiqar Babar to McCullum, OUT, picks out mid-on. Flat and full from Babar, McCullum wants to go over mid-on but fails to get under it sufficiently Straight to the fielder
Zulfiqar Babar to Umar Akmal, no run, a tad early into his drive, almost finds cover.
Wicket: ['BB McCullum c Perera b Zulfiqar Babar 20 (11b 2x4 1x6) SR: 181.81']

Commentary: Zulfiqar Babar to Umar Akmal, no run, flat on middle, pushed back
Anwar Ali to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, slower ball on middle, worked away towards midwicket
Anwar Ali to Umar Akmal, no run, on a length outside off, pushed towards cover

Anwar Ali to Umar Akmal, OUT, straight to mid-off. After blocking two deliveries, Akmal chips his wicket away looking for a big stroke. Just not good batting. Comes down the pitch, looking to go over the fielder at mid-off but picks him out perfectly.
Anwar Ali to Mohammad Rizwan, 2 runs, on a length outside off, carved away past point for a couple. Nicely played, let that come to him
Anwar Ali to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, on a length outside off, carved down to third man
Wicket: ['Umar Akmal c Perera b Anwar Ali 0 (4b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00']

Commentary: Anwar Ali to Fakhar Zaman, FOUR, up and over point. On a length outside off, Zaman gets underneath the length and sends the ball over point. Nicely controlled
Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Rizwan, no run, Rizwan comes down and defends. At least the intent to score is there
Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, leading edge just past cover. On a length on middle, a thick outside edge to long-off
Mohammad Nawaz to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, good single. Tip and run to point. Gets back and just pats this towards point
Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Rizwan, no run, beauty. Full delivery outside off, the ball beats the bat. Plenty of turn. Superb length, drew Rizwan forward

Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Rizwan, no run, what happened there? The umpire walks towards his partner to have a chat. Has it carried? Shehzad doesn't think he's taken it. A thick outside edge just lands in front of first slip. Lovely flight
Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, flat outside off, pushed to long-off

Hasan Khan to Mohammad Rizwan, OUT, big appeal and given. Pad first, then bat. Flat delivery on middle, Rizwan plants his front foot forward, puts his pad in line with the ball. The slider goes on, hits the pad, then bat. Sir Viv Richards goes wild on the bench. Well bowled
Hasan Khan to Elliott, no run, flat and straight, blocked
Hasan Khan to Elliott, 1 run, shortish delivery outside off, carved out to deep point
Hasan Khan to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, dropped? Flat delivery outside off, Zaman deflects the ball into the keeper's leg. Not really a drop. Saved some runs actually
Wicket: ['Mohammad Rizwan lbw b Hasan Khan 5 (8b 0x4 0x6) SR: 62.50']

Commentary: Hasan Khan to Elliott, 1 run, a nice paddle down towards fine leg for a couple
Hasan Khan to Fakhar Zaman, no run, flat on middle, played back. Another tidy over
Mohammad Nawaz to Elliott, 1 run, Elliott runs down and drives to long-off for one, with the spin
Mohammad Nawaz to Fakhar Zaman, no run, slow through the air, patted away towards point. No run
Mohammad Nawaz to Fakhar Zaman, no run, comes down, the ball spins a touch and hits the batsman on the pad, misses his flick
Mohammad Nawaz to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, slow through the air, Zaman flat-bats his swipe to long-on on the bounce
Mohammad Nawaz to Elliott, no run, slow through the air, driven to cover
Mohammad Nawaz to Elliott, 1 run, flat delivery outside off, hit away to deep cover for a run
Zulfiqar Babar to Elliott, no run, Elliott comes down, Babar bowls that slightly wide, played away towards cover
Zulfiqar Babar to Elliott, no run, defended into the off side
Zulfiqar Babar to Elliott, 1 run, slow on the pads, played away towards midwicket
Zulfiqar Babar to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, slow through the air on middle, outside-halved towards third man

Zulfiqar Babar to Elliott, OUT, worked away to short fine leg for a quick single. Has he made his ground through? Sarfraz thinks he has his man. he does. Wonderful fielding, quick release, on the full to the keeper.
Zulfiqar Babar to Sohail Tanvir, no run, chipped back, almost to the bowler. Slow through the air, short. Tanvir is too early through his stroke
Hasan Khan to Elliott, 1 run, flat delivery on middle, Elliott goes back and punches to long-off
Hasan Khan to Sohail Tanvir, no run, pushed back towards the bowler
Hasan Khan to Sohail Tanvir, 1 run, fired in on leg, worked away to deep square leg for a run
Hasan Khan to Elliott, no run, beauty. Flat delivery on middle, the ball grips and turns. Elliott is squared up, gets a leading edge towards cover
Hasan Khan to Elliott, 1 run, pushed away to long-on
Hasan Khan to Sohail Tanvir, 1 run, pushed away to long-on with the spin. Another tidy over ticks by
Perera to Sohail Tanvir, 1 run, on the pads, worked away to deep square leg

Perera to Elliott, 1 run, dropped! Oh my. Ahmed Shehzad. That should have been gobbled up. A length delivery on middle,m Elliott mis-times his drive, the ball goes straight to long-on. Shehzad runs in and lets the ball through
Perera to Sohail Tanvir, 1 run, another slower ball, worked away to deep midwicket
Perera to Elliott, no run, slower yorker outside off, jammed out
Perera to Elliott, 1 run, worked away through midwicket
Perera to Sohail Tanvir, 1 run, full and straight, played away to long-off awkwardly. Good over from Perera

Mohammad Nawaz to Sohail Tanvir, OUT, bowled around his legs. Flat delivery on middle and leg, Tanvir looks to execute a fine paddle sweep. He has to connect, he doesn't. The stumps light up as the ball makes contact
Mohammad Nawaz to Narine, 1 run, tossed up down leg, Narine slogs down to fine leg
Mohammad Nawaz to Elliott, no run, slow through the air, straight, defended
Mohammad Nawaz to Elliott, 1 run, comes down the track, driven to long-on
Mohammad Nawaz to Narine, 1 run, flat down leg, clipped away to square leg, another single
Mohammad Nawaz to Elliott, 2 runs, pushed away past cover, a couple more as long-off cleans up
Perera to Narine, 2 runs, just clears short third man. A slow, straight delivery. Narine's swipe across the line results in a top edge that just evades the fielder at short third
Perera to Narine, 1 leg bye, another slower delivery, straight. Narine misses his slog again. Did that pitch outside leg? Yes says the umpire
Perera to Elliott, FOUR, a thick outside edge and it races away past short third man. Pace off the ball. Lucky for Elliott

Perera to Elliott, FOUR, another one. What are the odds? Slower delivery outside off, Elliott looks for the same stroke, to go over cover, the ball takes the outside edge and evades a diving Sarfraz to his right
Perera to Elliott, 1 run, off the middle this time, but one to long-off
Perera to Narine, no run, slower ball outside off, trickles away to the keeper. No pace at all
Mills to Elliott, no run, some pace there. A quick bouncer on leg, Elliott lets this one go
Mills to Elliott, 1 run, a bouncer on leg, pulled to deep midwicket
Mills to Narine, no run, another slower delivery. Narine has no idea which direction that is going in. Beaten by a considerable distance
Mills to Narine, 2 runs, a top edge and it lands safely. Short outside off, Narine wanted to hit that over point. Not proper connection. A couple to third man
Mills to Narine, no run, a wild swing, completely beaten, excellent slower delivery
Mills to Narine, SIX, the extra ball goes a long way. Slower ball on leg, Narine clears his front leg and slogs the ball way over long-on. Handy blow
Perera to Elliott, 1 run, driven up to long-off for a run
Perera to Narine, SIX, slogged away for six. A decisive blow. Slower delivery down leg, Narine slogs. Anwar is patrolling the midwicket boundary, gets back and just parries the ball over
Perera to Narine, 1 run, driven upto long-off
Perera to Elliott, 1 run, slower ball outside off, pushed long-off
Perera to Narine, 1 run, a slower ball on middle and leg, driven to long-on. Just one
Perera to Elliott, 1 run, slower ball o off, swiped to deep square leg for one
Mohammad Nawaz to Elliott, 1 run, tossed up on leg, driven to long-on. That's all the Qalandars need
Mohammad Nawaz to Narine, 1 leg bye, a wild swing, off the pad and away towards fine leg
Mohammad Nawaz to Elliott, no run, slow down leg, Elliott misses his sweep, struck on the pad. Missing leg

Mohammad Nawaz to Elliott, OUT, bowled. Big wicket. Flat delivery and straight, not very pacey. Gets the ball to stop a touch, beats the bat and hits middle stump. Undone by the pace of the surface. Beautifully bowled
Mohammad Nawaz to Bilawal Bhatti, 1 run, driven to long-off with the spin
Mohammad Nawaz to Narine, SIX, fired outside off, Narine doesn't care, clears his front leg and heaves the ball way over long-on. Six more. What an innings he has played
Mills to Bilawal Bhatti, no run, full and wide, inside the tramline. Bhatti misses his drive

Mills to Bilawal Bhatti, OUT, how is that? A direct hit at the bowler's end. it's either a wicket or two runs. A length delivery from Mills, tapped to cover. The fielder picks up, turns around and effects a direct hit at the bowler's end. Bhatti is short by a few inches. Fantastic fielding. How crucial will that be?

Mills to Narine, OUT, gone! Quetta have the wicket they need. What bowling from Mills. Doesn't bother with the slower delivery, goes full and straight. Just a touch short than a full length. Narine is rooted in the crease and the ball pins him right in front. On this surface, bounce is hardly going to be a factor. Given.
Mills to Mohammad Irfan, 1 run, just wide of slip. Full outside off, a thick outside edge. Splendid captaincy from Sarfraz, he has third man so fine for the No. 11
Mills to Yasir Shah, no run, good length outside off, blocked to cover
Mills to Yasir Shah, no run, uh oh. Full and wide, Yasir looks to go over mid-off. No contact. Suddenly, run rate is a factor too
Hasan Khan to Mohammad Irfan, 1 run, short on off, pulled to long-on
Hasan Khan to Yasir Shah, 1 run, shouldn't be a run there. Worked down to short fine leg for a quick single. Is there a direct hit? Irfan took his time to get across but got there eventually
Hasan Khan to Mohammad Irfan, 1 run, driven decently to long-off. Another single.

Hasan Khan to Yasir Shah, OUT, straight up and Hasan takes a juggled catch. The Quetta Gladiators complete a stunning turnaround victory. A touch short from Hasan, yasir goes back and looks to pull but gets a thick leading edge, goes straight up and Hasan settles underneath it.
